    • Field Detail

      • PACK_TIDS

        public static final boolean PACK_TIDS
        When true, we will pack term identifiers using LongPacker.

        Note: This option requires that term identifiers are non-negative. That is not currently true for the cluster due to the TermIdEncoder.

        See Also:
        Pack TIDs, Constant Field Values

      • compare

        public static int compare(IV iv1,
          IV iv2)
        This provides a dumb comparison across IVs.

      • encode

        public static IKeyBuilder encode(IKeyBuilder keyBuilder,
                 IV iv)
        Encode an RDF value into a key for one of the statement indices. Handles null IV references gracefully.
        Parameters:
        keyBuilder - The key builder.
        iv - The internal value (can be null).
        Returns:
        The key builder.

      • decode

        public static IV decode(byte[] key)
        Decode an IV from a byte[].
        Parameters:
        key - The byte[].
        Returns:
        The IV.

      • decode

        public static IV[] decode(byte[] key,
          int numTerms)
        Decodes up to numTerms IVs from a byte[].
        Parameters:
        key - The byte[].
        numTerms - The number of terms to decode.
        Returns:
        The set of IVs.

      • decode

        public static IV[] decode(byte[] key,
          int offset,
          int numTerms)
        Decodes up to numTerms IVs from a byte[].
        Parameters:
        key - The byte[].
        offset - The offset into the byte[] key.
        numTerms - The number of terms to decode.
        Returns:
        The set of IVs.

      • decodeAll

        public static IV[] decodeAll(byte[] key)
        Decodes all IVs from a byte[].
        Parameters:
        key - The byte[].
        Returns:
        The set of IVs.

      • decodeAll

        public static IV[] decodeAll(byte[] key,
             int off,
             int len)
        Decodes IVs from a slice of a byte[].
        Parameters:
        key - The byte[].
        off - The offset of the first encoded IV in the byte[].
        len - The #of bytes of valid data to be decoded starting at that offset.
        Returns:
        The IVs in the order in which they were decoded.

      • decodeFromOffset

        public static IV decodeFromOffset(byte[] key,
                  int offset)
        Decode one IV.
        Parameters:
        key - The unsigned byte[] key.
        offset - The offset.
        Returns:
        The IV decoded from that offset.

      • decodeFromOffset

        public static IV decodeFromOffset(byte[] key,
                  int offset,
                  boolean nullIsNullRef)
        Decode one IV.
        Parameters:
        key - The unsigned byte[] key.
        offset - The offset.
        nullIsNullRef - When true a termId:=0L IV is decoded as a null reference. Otherwise it is decoded using TermId.mockIV(VTE).
        Returns:
        The IV decoded from that offset.
